raw_content:
List of football clubs in Italy

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
Jump to navigation Jump to search

This is a list of football clubs located in Italy, sorted by division, then alphabetically, and including geographical locations, home stadium information and club positions in the prior season.

Contents

  • 1 Clubs by division
    • 1.1 Serie A
    • 1.2 Serie B
    • 1.3 Serie C (formally Lega Pro)
      • 1.3.1 Group A (North & Central West)
      • 1.3.2 Group B (North and Central East)
      • 1.3.3 Group C (South)
    • 1.4 Serie D
      • 1.4.1 Girone A
      • 1.4.2 Girone B
      • 1.4.3 Girone C
      • 1.4.4 Girone D
      • 1.4.5 Girone E
      • 1.4.6 Girone F
      • 1.4.7 Girone G
      • 1.4.8 Girone H
      • 1.4.9 Girone I
  • 2 References
  • 3 See also
